Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, California, Cermak, Western and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via26th, California, Cermak, Western and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Augusta/Humphrey
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Augusta, Chicago & Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Augusta/Humphrey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted  via Ridgeland, Division, Augusta, Chicago & Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Augusta/Humphrey.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
